message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a fantastic product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you at a price of $20000.  Let me know your thoughts!
I'm interested in the product, but $20000 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $15000 for it. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. $15000 is a bit below my minimum, but I'm willing to negotiate further. How about $17500? This would still be a good deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $17500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $16250. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
